nodes.text: The Dalnans were a society which lived on the planet Dalna, including both humans and Pantorans. A Dalnan delegation, including Ambassador Weft, his son Honesty, and Janex, boarded the cruiser Steady Wing to attend the dedication ceremony of the Starlight Beacon space station. The Dalnans practiced a coming-of-age ritual called Metamorphosis Trials, which were intended to test their children on the skills required for their chosen life paths.
